title: do u get Rp in any lvl?
body:
i opened new account and i remember that i my last account its gave me RP and i didn`t buy//
do i get some without buy?

thanks

replies.body: Awhile back we [**changed the level up rewards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp). In the past you did get 400 RP upon hitting level 3 but we've since replaced that with a special chest containing some champion shards, essence to craft them, and a semi-random skin shard.
No they changed that from getting 400rp to getting a special chest.
